dict.acceptation: 瓶子；一瓶（的量）；（婴儿）奶瓶；酒；

sent.orig: DO NOT be a three-bottle woman: Flower (only beautifulness) bottle; Vinegar (Jealousy) bottle; Medicine (sickness) bottle.
sent.trans: 不要当三瓶女人：花瓶，醋瓶，药瓶。

sent.orig: Constitution: By attachment, drive pipe, bottle cap, bottle body, dip pipe, support and suspension hook constitution.
sent.trans: 构成：由接头、导管、瓶盖、瓶体、水封管、支架和挂钩构成。

sent.orig: Collects hotly along with inside-bottle painting elevates temperature unceasingly inside-bottle painting collection price also unceasingly rises.
sent.trans: 随着内画收藏热不断升温，内画的收藏价格也不断走高。

sent.orig: There is a bottle on the table. The bottle is empty.
sent.trans: 桌子上有一个瓶子。这瓶子是空的。

sent.orig: Tim threw the empty bottle away, saying "Another bottle of good wine bites the dust."
sent.trans: 蒂姆把空酒瓶一扔，说道：“又一瓶好酒喝光了”
